item.title: CVE-2024-30478|2024-08-02T01:38:59.529Z -- bulletin -- wordpress%20announcement%20%26%20notification%20banner%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20bulletin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Bulletin WordPress Announcement & Notification Banner Plugin – Bulletin.This issue affects WordPress Announcement & Notification Banner Plugin – Bulletin: from n/a through 3.8.5.
